Condor:

Condor wasn't ready to this attack and it hit him. Condor fell and he 
was stunned and defendless !!!!

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "rAuq" <rauq@t...> wrote:
> Astroblast sees Condor firing on Menasor, and chuckles, "Heh, a 
> weak attack like that wont even touch 'im." He then transforms into 
> robot mode and fires four Ionic displacer blasts at Condor.
> 
>

> >
